input.label: Target Host (please input exact interface name)

chart.title: Traffic In
chart.searchTemplate: index="cacti_perf" poller="$poller$" target_host="$target_host$" | timechart span=1h avg(traffic_in) by target_host

chart.title: Traffic Out
chart.searchTemplate: index="cacti_perf" poller="$poller$" target_host="$target_host$" | timechart span=1h avg(traffic_out) by target_host

table.title: Traffic Events
table.searchTemplate: index="cacti_perf" poller="$poller$" target_host="$target_host$" | table target_host discards_in discards_out errors_in errors_out
